subtitle: This is what is classed as nursery food as it just slips down a treat. Serve well chilled or even make the day before.

method.text: Blend the cornflour with enough milk to form a smooth paste.
Pour the remaining milk into a pan with the orange juice and rind. Bring to the boil.
Strain the milk onto the blended mixture stirring constantly. Return the mixture to the pan and bring to the boil stirring constantly until the mixture thickens. Add sugar and cook for 2 min.
Pour into a well-greased 600 ml / 1 pint jelly mould. Leave to set in the fridge.
Turn out onto a serving plate and serve immediately.

title: Chocolate orange blancmange
